nodes.text: The year 4085 before the Battle of Yavin (BBY), also known as the year 432 before the Treaty of Coruscant (BTC), was a period of time in the era between the Manderon Period and the Old Sith Wars. That year, the planet Ord Mantell produced a vintage of wine that, following the Treaty of Coruscant in 3653 BBY, was known as 432 BTC. The vintage was a particularly rare and valuable one.
